attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The searching of the House of Commons office of Conservative MP Damian Green highlights how thin our democracy is. 

Using Anti-terror police to remove love letters from his private house also reveals that we are on the edge of losing our democracy. 

People are shocked and worried by what you have allowed to happen. The Metropolitan Police are not under proper control.

I therefore petition the Prime Minister to step back from the brink and set up formal and constitutional special protections for MPs trying to reveal government failure by any legal means.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
